name: 15-Minute FX Momentum Trend Strategy
description: Trades EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY and AUD/USD on 15-minute candles using the proprietary Momentum Trend Strategy signal. Entries require momentum signal alignment with RSI(14) strength and above-average tick volume; exits on signal reversal, RSI fade, or bracketed stop/target. Risk per trade capped at 1.25 % of equity via dynamic position sizing. Protective stop at 0.35 % and profit target at 0.9 % of entry price.
